text: We also have been creating our own Accessible forms over top of the HS features. Super interested in the progress of this and can't seem to find a good way to filter A11y related issues on the Changelog.

I’m not sure how you would do this without coding…. I think the way I would approach this:
use the embed code for the form, and then use the _`onFormSubmit`_ method to search the form to see if any errors are present and then scroll to it
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>

probably a more advanced solution. I’m not sure if there is an easier one.
